attributes.action: Ensure UK families get priority over immigrants in accessing council housing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK families should get a higher priority than immigrants in accessing council housing. In common with many nations those that choose to enter this Country should only be allowed if they can provide health insurance, employment and their own accommodation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
